lead_paragraph: With ace Clayton Kershaw's troublesome back making him somewhat of an unknown for the stretch run, the contending Los Angeles Dodgers boosted their depleted rotation Monday by getting left-hander Rich Hill and right fielder Josh Reddick from the Oakland Athletics for a trio of pitching prospects.

headline.print_headline: Contending Dodgers Get Rich Hill, Josh Reddick From A's
headline.main: Contending Dodgers Get Rich Hill, Josh Reddick From A's
